I’m heading up a new data and tech team at the Innovation Growth Lab. We will be creating data driven analysis and technology prototypes to support policy and decision makers working on science, innovation and entrepreneurship.

title: George Richardson
text:
This is a website for me, George. It contains information about myself and my work, a blog and other bits and pieces that might interest you, depending on what you’re into.
For the last few years, I’ve worked as a data scientist or a leader of data science and engineering teams, creating research and applications with social impact aims. I’ve also run various other projects, such as a DIY bike workshop and a community garden.
I’m interested in the intersections of science and technology, ecological and social issues, strategy and left/socialist politics. Though I would class myself as an expert in none of those things.
You can also find me on X/Twitter, GitHub and LinkedIn.
This website is made with Quarto.

title: Hello to a new blog
text:
This is a new place for me to blog. I plan to write about science and technology, left-wing politics and reflections about life.
Creating this blog is a bit of a challenge to myself. I spend a lot of time thinking and not enough time bringing coherence to those thoughts or sharing them through writing. I want to change that for myself and for others who might find what I have to say useful.
I occasionally post on Twitter (currently known as X) but find I’m not great at condensing what I want to say enough to fit the format well. I’ll still post on there occasionally and tag people who I mention here, but I’d rather stick mostly to long-form for now.
I hope you will find something you enjoy or can make use of here.
